dataList.name: Monthly Lunacy Supply
dataList.desc:
Get 650 Lunacy instantly upon purchase.
Receive an additional 65 Free Lunacy each day you log in for 30 days.

dataList.name: Season 1 Orienteer Supplies
dataList.desc:

· Lunacy x5040

· Thread x80
· Season 1 Nominable Egoshard Crate x40
